name: Game A Week - S2C1-2018 - Theme for Project 1
name_original: Game A Week - S2C1-2018 - Theme for Project 1
description:
As part of the rapid prototyping class I am giving this semester, we'll be doing 5 games in the coming five weeks. This is the theme reveal game for Project 1 of week 1! Get with it!

This unit was greatly inspired by the 2018 GDC talk by game developers and professors Douglas Wilson and Bennett Foddy which talks about the "Game a Week" model.
